get.desc: Get a list of all Activity Log Alert rules in a resource group.

default.desc: An error occurred and the list of Activity Log Alert rules could not be retrieved.

delete.desc: Delete an Activity Log Alert rule.

200.desc: The Activity Log Alert rule was successfully deleted.

204.desc: The Activity Log Alert rule does not exist. It may have already been deleted.

default.desc: An error occurred and the Activity Log Alert rule could not be deleted.
